# Task

Write a function `clean_column` that cleans a column name (`col`) by lowercasing it, stripping any leading or trailing whitespaces, and replacing any spaces and hyphens with an underscore, eg, "My Column" becomes "my_column".



# Data

clean_column("My Column")

```julia
function clean_column(col)
    lowercase!(col)  # Lowercase the column name
    trim!(col)         # Remove leading and trailing whitespaces
    col = replace(col, r"[\s-]" => "_"))  # Replace spaces and hyphens with underscore
    return col
end

clean_column("My Column")  # Output: "my_column"
```
The function `clean_column` takes a column name as input and returns the cleaned version according to the specified requirements.
